math.text: A bead produced by a machine will be selected at random. If 29 out of every 100 beads have a defect, what is the probability of selecting a bead that has a defect?
Each side of a square has a length of 45. What is the perimeter of the square?
An object travels at a constant speed of 12 centimeters per second. How long will it take for the object to travel 108 centimeters?
Data set X: 5, 9, 9, 13; Data set Y: 5, 9, 9, 13, 27. Which statement correctly compares the mean of data set X and data set Y?
options: The mean of data set X is greater than the mean of data set Y.
The mean of data set X is less than the mean of data set Y.
The means of data set X and data set Y are equal.
There is not enough information to compare the means.
math.correctAnswer: The mean of data set X is less than the mean of data set Y.

math.text: If 4 + x^2 = 12, what is the value of 16x + 8?
The total cost to lease a car is represented by f(x) = 36x + 1000. What is the total cost when the monthly payment is $400?
What is the maximum number of large candles the owner can purchase with a $2,200 budget if each costs $11.60, while maintaining a minimum purchase of 200 candles?
In a rocket launch, 467,000 kg of propellant was present initially, and 362,105 kg remained after 21 seconds. On average, how much propellant was burned per second?
What is the width of a rectangle with an area of 1,176 ft² if the length is 6 times the width?
In a group of 21 people, the company’s revenue is $80 per adult and $60 per child. If the total revenue was $1,440, how many children were in the group?
If f(x) = 4x² - 50x + 126, for what value of x does f(x) reach its minimum?
What is the height from which an object was kicked if h(t) = -4.9t² + 7t + 9 represents its motion?
What is the y-intercept of the graph given by f(x) = -2x + 6?
If a circle has a circumference of 144π, what is the length of an arc subtended by a 90° angle?
If f(0) = 8 and f(1) = 12, which equation represents the linear function f?

english.text: Benito Juarez became one of the most ______ figures in his country’s history.
Due to their often strange images and syntax, John Ashbery's poems are difficult to ______.
Some scientists argue that the ______ change in the fossil record was caused by body types more likely to be preserved.
Given its prevalence, the accessory spleen may actively support diving mechanisms.
Research findings may persuade scholars to ______ that women held leadership roles in the Bronze Age.
Many people ______ use bottle gourds as containers.
The process of mechanical recycling is often considered ______.
Night wears a garment all velvet soft, all violet blue...
The studies suggest that Mexican American women ______ during World War II.
